front.title: Requirements for a Handover Information Service

abstract.t: Handover Information Services may be used to assist handovers betweenone network to another network or within a network, based on storednetwork knowledge. Information Services can be used to provideessential network related information e.g. topology and channelinformation which may allow a moving host to select an appropriatelink-layer connection to make, amongst available networks, whetherusing the same technology or heterogeneous technologies.This document is an effort to describe use cases and transportrequirements for handover information services, when they aretransported over IP networks.
